titleStmt.title: An oration to the most illustrious and mightie prince Frederick King of Bohemia. Made by Martin Opitius of Silesia. Translated out of Latin
Oratio ad serenissimum ac potentissimum principem Fridericum, Regem Bohemiæ. English
titleStmt.author: Opitz, Martin, 1597-1639.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Oratio ad serenissimum ac potentissimum principem Fridericum, Regem Bohemiæ.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
